posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 705 Sq.
Verdant at Green Valley is situated on the shores of Clear Lake and offers a resort-like lifestyle.
Our community features one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes in Fairfield, CA.
Our residents enjoy modern living infused with energy and an ample list of luxurious amenities.
Spend a moment browsing our collection of photos and discover the active lifestyle to be enjoyed.
Then make your way to our selection of floor plans and decide which one suits your needs.
Our professional leasing team is ready to provide you with exemplary service and your new chosen home.
